Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

DDK Digital Function: DMAC_disable

Discussion

Input:

DMA_channel

Output:

Nothing
All registers changed

Purpose:

Masks DMA channel, inhibiting DMA transfers


Group: DDK Support Routines for Digital Sound Drivers
